name: Stolen Fish (early access)
description:
An upcoming game built on Godot. it is currently under development so keep your eyes peeled!

and since this project is in early access, user feedback is welcome! and if it was finished, it would release on Steam, Microsoft Store, and Xbox.

this itch.io page is currently for the alpha version but there would be a new version coming soon (there is no controller support right now if you want to play with a controller then use a controller config software or use steam to run the game)

TrailerDetails

Engine: Godot

Platforms: Windows, Xbox One/Series

Release Date: 2023

Screenshots Credits

Cooldude2144: creator of the game who did nearly everything

Finn Pickart: the guy who created the godot template
